issue.title: [CF 463] Inline Aura Compatibility
issue.body:
Cybeloras edit: No need to keep the defect ticket template in there for a feature request

Currently, the "Show timer text" button in the options is unavailable unless you have OmniCC running. I would like to make a suggestion to allow the compatibility with another similar addon, Inline Aura ( http://www.curse.com/addons/wow/inline-aura ).


> Posted by CurseForge user yesitisi | Imported from CurseForge issue #463 | Raw

comments.body:
It looks line IA shows the duration of buffs/debuffs associated with cooldown on your actions bars - this is sugnificantly different from the functions of OmniCC and tullacc. Since TMW is not an action bar mod, and IA has no external API to support non-actionbar implementation, this cannot happen.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
